item.title: Regex in Languages
item.description: Perl $foo =~ /$pattern/ Match groups $&, $1, ... Replace $string =~ s/pattern/replacement/g; Reference https://perldoc.perl.org/perlre.html Ruby 'string' =~ /pattern/ /pattern/ =~ 'string' m = 'string'.match(/pattern/) Match groups m[1] Replace 'string'.gsub(/(o+)/, '\1\1\1') #=> "foooooo" Reference https://www.rubyguides.com/2015/06/ruby-regex/ PHP preg_match($pattern, $str, $matches) Match groups $matches[1] Replace $newString = preg_replace($pattern, $replacement, $str); Reference https://www.w3schools.com/php/php_regex.asp JavaScript var Array = str.match(pattern) Match groups Array[0] Replace str.
